feed.title: Workout Tracker Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v2.1.0
entry.content:
Breaking change for imperial unit users!

Weights stored in the database since this release are now correctly converted from the user's preferred unit (kilograms or pounds). However, the weights stored before this release were not converted before storing. If you entered "10 pounds", it was stored as "10 kg" but shown as "10 pounds". This means that data entered before this release will be wrong. What was 10 pounds will now show 22 pounds...

If you want to update all weights in the workout table (eg. all your users use pounds), you can run this single query:

sql update map_data set total_weight = total_weight * 2.20462262;

What's Changed

  • chore(deps): bump golangci/golangci-lint-action from 6.1.1 to 6.2.0 in the all group by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/408
  • fix(database): Handle zero duration in workout average speed calculation by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/409
  • feat(import): Implement export and import CLI commands by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/410
  • fix(app): Fix redirect URLs after workout creation by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/415
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/413
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/414
  • chore(deps): bump the all group with 5 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/418
  • chore(deps): bump actions/setup-go from 5.2.0 to 5.3.0 in the all group by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/416
  • Bump all dependencies by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/419
  • fix(filter): Update the unscoped value for the since filter by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/420
  • Development improvements by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/422
  • Ignore templ watch files by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/423
  • Bug fixes and debugging tools by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/424
  • feat(api): Add endpoint to create manual workouts by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/425
  • Add daily measurements by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/427
  • chore(deps): bump golangci/golangci-lint-action from 6.2.0 to 6.3.2 in the all group by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/426
  • Improve the measurement conversions and interface by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/428
  • Update changelog by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/430

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v2.0.3...v2.1.0

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v2.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add support for FitoTrack backup files by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/459
  • feat(zip): Add support for zip files by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/460
  • fix(lint): Rename function consistent with conventions by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/461
  • feat(workouts): Allow uploading zip and ftb files by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/462
  • Update changelog by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/463
  • chore(docs): Add resources to edit GPX files by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/464
  • fix(json): Sanitize invalid JSON values from database by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/466
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/465
  • chore(simplify): Remove unused variables from the function by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/467
  • chore(deps): Update all dependencies by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/468
  • fix(alerts): Store alerts in session manager by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/469
  • chore(alerts): Restructure alerts and notification translation strings by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/470
  • fix(translations): Fix alert / notification indentation by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/471
  • chore(translations): Use variable interpolation by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/472
  • Add more interpolation to translations by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/473
  • chore(translations): Refactor more translations to support pluralization by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/474
  • fix(i18n): Correct ellipsis in translations by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/475
  • fix(i18n): Re-set the user's requested language after authentication by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/477
  • chore(test): Check if all workout types are defined in English by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/479
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/golang-jwt/jwt/v5 from 5.2.1 to 5.2.2 in the go_modules group by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/481
  • chore(deps): bump golangci/golangci-lint-action from 6.5.0 to 6.5.1 in the all group by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/480
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/476
  • Refactor translation keys by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/478
  • fix(i18n): Fix refactoring error by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/482
  • fix(fit): skip invalid coordinates by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/483
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/484
  • fix(db): use bytes type for content fields by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/485
  • fix(i18n): Fix translation mishaps... by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/486
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/487
  • feat(i18n): add polish language support by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/490
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/488
  • feat(i18n): Enable Polish translation by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/491
  • feat(release): Add release tooling by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/492

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v2.1.1...v2.2.0

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v2.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/494

  • fix(api) Fix WorkoutData json names by @bastianjoel in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/502
  • fix(api): whoami result not wrapped in APIResponse by @bastianjoel in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/503
  • Replace delete with htmx by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/504
  • Update swagger by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/505

New Contributors

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v2.2.0...v2.2.1

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v2.2.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Test user returned from API contains no sensitive information by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/506
  • Fix workout equipment not saved by @bastianjoel in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/509
  • fix(filters): Fix the different filters with translation keys by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/511
  • fix(uint64): Match the bit size of the uint64 IDs by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/512

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v2.2.1...v2.2.2
